answerText: Sean O'Casey[10] O'Casey provoked riots at the Abbey Theater with this play, in which Jack Clitheroe dies during the Easter Rising.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 19 | 12 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In one of this author's plays, the one-armed Johnny is killed, possibly due to his betrayal of Robbie Tancred. For 10 points each: [10] Name this Irish playwright of Shadow of a Gunman and Juno and the Paycock.
